mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS roomId, r.name AS roomName, r.location, r.capacity, COUNT(b.id) AS bookingCount, ROUND( COUNT(b.id) * 100.0 / (DATEDIFF(#{endDate}, #{startDate}) + 1), 2 ) AS usageRate FROM room r LEFT JOIN booking b ON r.id = b.room_id AND b.status = 1 AND b.start_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND b.is_deleted = 0 WHERE r.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY r.id, r.name, r.location, r.capacity ORDER BY bookingCount DESC
